img_above_text:
![Wukong YellowFlower 61.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/db/Wukong_YellowFlower_61.jpg)
If he takes to the air, play it safe and hang back, waiting to dodge when he divekicks his way back to you before trying to Immobilize and counter him.
img_below_text:
If he tries to shoot out various wing-tip projectiles at you, don't panic and just use your staff spin to knock them all aside.
![Wukong YellowFlower 63.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/ac/Wukong_YellowFlower_63.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.

If he takes to the air, play it safe and hang back, waiting to dodge when he divekicks his way back to you before trying to Immobilize and counter him."
        - Following Text: "If he tries to shoot out various wing-tip projectiles at you, don't panic and just use your staff spin to knock them all aside.

img_summary: The image depicts a boss fight in *Black Myth: Wukong* against the "Supreme Inspector." The player character, Wukong, is engaged in combat within a lush forest environment. The boss appears to be mid-attack, surrounded by fiery and smoky effects. The preceding and following text provides strategies for dealing with the boss's aerial divekicks and projectile attacks, emphasizing defensive maneuvers and counterattacks.
